item.description:
I'll start to schedule a monthly book club meeting.... The location can change once we get everything going. This month's read (February) will be The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitgerald. The book for the month of March is up for discussion. If you have any suggestions, please email them or we'll vote at the meeting.

I hope to see you there!!!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in a long sleeved green shirt sitting in the cafe. Hope to see you there
item.name: Book Club
